pullrequest.title: Update Visual's get/set functions and add unit tests

content.raw:
about :

~~~
EXPECT_EQ(_type, msgs::ConvertGeometryType(msgs::ConvertGeometryType(_type)));
~~~

somehow I am a little more pedantic about comparing with hardcoded value more often to be sure the values are correct. This is to avoid situations where `EXPECT_EQ(a, b)` is true but `a` and `b` got turned into `NULL`s or `0`s somewhere in the code. You mind if I leave the existing comparisons in place in addition to your one?

about :

EXPECT_EQ(_type, msgs::ConvertGeometryType(msgs::ConvertGeometryType(_type)));

somehow I am a little more pedantic about comparing with hardcoded value more often to be sure the values are correct. This is to avoid situations where EXPECT_EQ(a, b) is true but a and b got turned into NULLs or 0s somewhere in the code. You mind if I leave the existing comparisons in place in addition to your one?
